snippet.title: Ribbit Channel Trailer
snippet.description:
The toad detective airs the first episode of his own TV-show. The investigation is broadcasted live. You will help to find the missing museum exhibit.
Ribbit Channel is a short interactive cartoon. Graphics is done entirely in claymation, and the game itself is filled with color and warmth. The bright plasticine world will motivate your child to sculpt from modelling clay, and perhaps remind your childhood. Our plasticine story will make you happier and cheer you up on a rainy day.

If you want to purchase the game contact me directly.

FOLLOW ME:

Facebook🐸 https://www.facebook.com/deadharlequin 
Twitter🌙 https://twitter.com/DeadHarlequin
Instagram🌿 https://www.instagram.com/lisa_markova_/
Support me on Patreon❤️ https://www.patreon.com/home
